    The domain user management api.

        userName - the user name
        Returns:

                produces="application/json",
                method=DELETE)

                                                                                                                                                                           String userName)
        Delete domain user.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        true if the domain user was deleted, otherwise false
